sub_title: Managing Partner, Head of Partnerships, Executive Coach
summary:
Alla is a senior executive, with an Executive MBA at INSEAD that acquired a decade of expertise in top-tier corporates with involvement in the startup ecosystem. She has vast expertise in Management consulting, Digital strategies, Innovation, and the latest technologies. Her exposure to most industry verticals combined with expertise in the ICT domain and strong business acumen has proven beneficial. She has served with distinction several Fortune 500 clients and global brands across Europe, Russia, and South Africa. 
After co-founding Xtatio (SAAS company), Alla had enriched her leadership abilities, further becoming an entrepreneur. As a digital evangelist, she advocates leveraging digital tools, apps & platforms in every marketing & sales strategy that provide excellent capabilities to target your audience, engages the customer, and provides measurable results.

profile_positions.description:
A transformative 12-month journey focused on deepening environmental, social, and governance (ESG) expertise. INSEAD, renowned for pioneering sustainability in business education, offers this programme grounded in real-world applications and the UN's Sustainable Development Goals (SDG). 
The curriculum blends digital simulations, guest lectures, live virtual sessions, and an Action Learning Project, ensuring participants are well-equipped to champion sustainability strategies and foster long-term organizational growth.
profile_positions.title: Success Coach, Sustainability Leadership Programme for Senior Executives

profile_positions.description:
The Business School for the World®. Transforming and empowering 11,000+ executives yearly to strengthen leadership & business skills, with new perspectives, thinking & ideas.

•  Guide executives with defining and improving corporate strategy framework (including methodology, process, and all required guidelines, standards, templates, and tools)
•  Assess feasibility of strategic initiatives and advised with ideation & recommendations on the value and feasibility of strategic and financial opportunities and potential growth options
•  Co-create new value prop and GTM strategies for B2B, B2C and B2B2C customer segments as well as drove thought leadership across technology trends for the majority of industries
Consulting, coaching & mentoring
•  Counsel senior leaders (individuals and groups) on a range of high-impact strategy projects from various industries and support them in developing a roadmap for digital transformation
•  Advise more than 500 world leaders and have been praised for my professionalism and industry knowledge.

Courses: 
Financial Analysis for Non-Financial Managers
Building Digital Partnerships and Ecosystems
Business Strategy and Financial Performance
Strategy in the age of Digital Disruption
Driving Digital Marketing Strategy
Transforming your business with AI
Developing emerging leaders
Leading organisation in disruptive times
profile_positions.title: Business Coach - Digital strategy and Leadership development

profile_positions.description:
BeeQueen Leaders is a community-driven organization that is using AI to transform the way women lead.
We use AI to personalize the experience for each member, provide real-time support, and identify and support future leaders.
We believe that AI has the potential to revolutionize the way we work and live, and we are committed to using it to create a more equitable and inclusive world for all.
profile_positions.title: Managing Queen

profile_positions.description:
Women in AI (www.womeninai.co) is a nonprofit global do-tank on a mission to increase female representation and participation in the field of Artificial Intelligence (AI). Now actively present across 115 countries, it is a 6K+ member's community-driven initiative that aims at fostering co-creation in the AI domain via education, events, research, and entrepreneurship. 
My key focus is cultivate and maintain relationships among our business partners while developing strategies for promoting gender diversity in AI. I execute the vision for the Women in AI partnership ecosystem and implement winning strategic partnerships to achieve 2x growth goals.
Our Netherlands chapter will launch Gala Award Ceremony, hackathon, youth activation program and mentorship program in 2023. Stay turned!
profile_positions.title: Head Of Partnerships - Women AI Netherlands

profile_positions.description: Certified professional coach, specializing in leadership development, career transition, and startup founders.  Passionate and excited to work with my ambitions and committed clients to achieve their goals and dreams.
profile_positions.title: Leadership & Transition Coach

profile_positions.description:
PA Consulting is a boutique consultancy focused on digital transformation, innovations, and building sustainable commercial models for blue-chip clients.

•  Developed new client accounts and introduced sales opportunities 
•  Promoted servitizatization solutions for Benelux manufacturing clients
profile_positions.title: PC consultant

profile_positions.description:
Xtatio was the first mobile application to help sales executives to close more deals. Our algorithms turn customer feedback into real-time actionable insights in every sales funnel stage. As one of the founders, I was involved in setting up Xtatio’s strategic direction, mission, and KPIs.

•  Initiated and published a series of “Future of sales” interviews with sales leaders In Benelux to flash new sales skills & capabilities that are required for sales executives in the age of digital disruption
•  Recognized as one of "Europe's 30 Most Promising Early-Stage Startups" 
•  Built up 10+ clients and achieved amazing results, amongst which Jaguar Land Rover (2,2X sold more cars per sales executives within 1 month), Co-match (15% increased conversion 4 months pilot), Heineken (10% increase in profitability Q1) e.g.
•  Xtatio had established a Net Promoter Score of 64 and reached an overall customer response rate for the customer insights requests of 69%
•  Was a keynote speaker and presenter on webinars and panel discussions at various accelerators (Rockstar, Amsterdam Bootcamp e.,g) to share experience and educate tech founders on digital sales strategies during the COVID
profile_positions.title: Founder & CCO

profile_positions.description: Mentor AI & Energy startups in regular acceleration and incubation programmes.
profile_positions.title: Business Mentor

profile_positions.description:
I worked with both Business and IT leaders to add value that helped grow Business including identification of new opportunities, simplification of landscape, and management of the business platform ecosystem.

As Business Architect, I was accountable for the vision, plan, and deliverables for Canon's Commercial organisation and Customer Fulfilment to ensure that Data Strategy is aligned with the Canon's long term vision.

Duties & Responsibilities:

• Local and Global cross-functional interface with key stakeholders across various functions. I was responsible for business strategy alignment with the ecosystem.
• Responsible for further design, development and continuous improvement of capabilities and the delivery of services. In Scope includes requirements, standard processes, tools, platforms, appropriate business rules, data management, and blueprint design for the capabilities
• Responsible for proper communication with respective business functions and markets to meet business needs and goals. Drives proactive risk assessment efforts to identify potential gaps and develop action plans needed to prevent recurrence of issues and resolve business needs
• Provided strategic direction that will lead to improved operating efficiencies and enhanced user experience.
• Utilized internal resources including budget for assigned team, consultants, and third party vendors for the execution of objectives.
• Built relationships with stakeholders.
• Influenced stakeholders and business partners to support vision and solutions for team.
• Aligned advocacy with key data stakeholders across various functions related to Global cross-functional interfaces.

Projects:
• AI/Robotics in Operations
• SAP migration to Oracle R12
• Post- merger projects like integration of Canon with Toshiba (Canon Healthcare) and Canon with OCE (new Canon BU).
profile_positions.title: European Business Architect

profile_positions.description: Supported founders building successful business models
profile_positions.title: Business Mentor
